column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////We had what seemed like almost the entire menu. Dishes that stood out include the garlic shrimp (I think I had an entire serving of this to myself)
column5: potatas bravas. Lots of savory tastes here (mmmm the meatballs) and some dishes are kind of heavy
column6: but there was definitely enough food to go around. And did I mention the sangria?
